name: Car.io
description:
Please go download our new game “Car.io”! Car.io is a traditional real time strategy game played from a top-down perspective.

Car.io welcomes you! The objective of the game is to travel through space while avoiding spiked traps and police cars, and to collect gold along the way.

HOW TO PLAY: Swipe to control your car.

Car.io – give yourself a piece of fun right now! The law of the jungle is: Only the strong survive. Kill or be killed!
